price: 73. Kay addal maggo caxâ mixuy maggo afah yaniy как takmeeni liton.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
